projects.name: Nairobi Urban Youth
projects.description: Empowering youth across Nairobi's urban communities
projects.fullDescription: Supporting youth in Kibera, Mathare, Korogocho, Mukuru, and other Nairobi urban communities through education, mentorship, tech literacy, AI skills, social enterprise, arts promotion, health programs, and career development.

projects.name: Music
projects.fullDescription: Empowering artists through music production tools, mentorship, and promotional opportunities to build sustainable creative careers.

projects.name: Learning
projects.fullDescription: Comprehensive educational platform offering environmental science, technology, and skill-building courses with recognized certifications.

projects.name: Battles
projects.fullDescription: Platform for creative expression through rap battles, poetry slams, and artistic competitions that celebrate cultural diversity and talent.

projects.name: Achievements
projects.fullDescription: Comprehensive achievement and milestone tracking system that recognizes progress, celebrates accomplishments, and motivates continued growth.
